display_information.name: ConsensusBot
display_information.description: Facilitate team decision-making through collaborative consensus building
display_information.long_description: ConsensusBot helps teams make decisions collaboratively by providing structured voting mechanisms, automated reminders, and automatic generation of Architecture Decision Records (ADRs). Features include configurable success criteria (Simple Majority, Supermajority, Unanimity), deadline enforcement, and Slack-native state management.
